title: enFont Terrible
subtitle: My silly portfolio
description:
After many years without a proper illustration portfolio, I decided to create a… pretty weird one.
The site contains more than twenty clickable spots that transform the drawings and reveal new elements to the casual visitor and the unsuspecting art director.
My favorite part of this project is that all the different states are stored inside the SVG files. My website (programmed using Vue.js) reads an image file and, based on the layer names, generates and render a specific kind of interaction. This allows me to update my portfolio without leaving Adobe Illustrator! :)
